title: Simulation-Based Productive Failure Mathematics Problem-Solving Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A process approaching complex real-life problems via collaborative problem-solving in smartphone-based VR simulation environments, leveraging initial failure experiences as learning starting points

learning_goals: Learners can explore at least three alternative problem-solving strategies in complex mathematical situations
Learners can visually represent problem-solving processes in VR simulation environments through team collaboration and propose improved solutions in over 70% of tasks
Learners can present at least two examples of reconstructing prior knowledge and applying it to real-life problems in project-based assessments

resources: Online whiteboard tool for collaborative discussions
Visual resource pack for training graphic representation flexibility
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
